ComicInfo.Summary:
Factory of Fear!: Johnny Peril travels to a small town where he discovers a factory full of strange people commanded by the Master of the 7 Stars.
Where Have You Gone, Solid Citizen?: Commissioner Randall has his soul "cleaned" by a gypsy woman.
The Night of the Devil Bugs!: Giant bugs attack a town.
